summary: A corrupt policeman commits a crime when drinking late at night. While his colleagues are trying to investigate his murder, he tries to clean up the evidence.
cast: Jose Coronado|Rodolfo Sancho|Helena Miquel|Juanjo Artero|Pedro Mari Sánchez|Younes Bachir|Nadia Casado|Juan Pablo Shuk|Eduard Farelo|Karim El-Kerem|Abdelali El Aziz|Nasser Saleh|Héctor Claramunt|Saïd El Mouden|Walter Gamberini|Chema Ruiz|Roberto Peralta|Lina Forero|Ricardo Dávila|Julio Jordán|Manuel Gancedo|Miguel de Lira|María Jesús Hoyos|Miguel Guardiola|Elvira Cuadrupani|José Juan Rodríguez|José Cantero|Cristhian Esquivel|Richard Sahagún|Daniel Ortiz|Carolina Clemente|María Blanco-Fafián|Manuel Tiedra|Juan Carlos Villanueva|Paloma Bloyd|Julio Perillán|Chani Martín|Olga Alamán|Bernabé Fernández|Esther Lara|Yiyo Alonso|Concha Rosales|Pere Brasó|Susana Costillo|Javier Iribarren|Emilio Martínez|Víctor Benavides|Luis del Valle|Alex Spijksma|Javier Pinto|Tusti de las Heras|Luis Fernández de Eribe
title: No habrá paz para los malvados
